short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Retry all failed jobs in Buildkite

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is for Buildkite user only.

Are you tired to click Retry on every failed step on your Buildkite build?

Well, I do. Especially, when most of them were just flaky tests. That's why I made this codemod to add a button to Retry all failed steps at once.

Just one click and move away. Let Buildkite continue doing what it's designed to do.
